name: paper-canvas-without-j-s-d-o-m
description: This is a forked version that does two things: remove jsdom dependency from packages.json and rename the package to not include jsdom in the module package naming, which is a whack for this: https://github.com/paperjs/paper.js/blob/develop/src/node/self.js#L33
